What is overfitting?
options: Model performs poorly on training data
Model performs well on both training and test data
Model memorizes training data and performs poorly on test data
answer: Model memorizes training data and performs poorly on test data

question: What is underfitting?
options: Model performs too well on test data
Model fails to learn patterns in training data
answer: Model fails to learn patterns in training data
